snippet: The victims at Sum Hospital in Bhubaneswar, in the state of Odisha, appear to have died of smoke inhalation....
abstract: Fire at Sum Hospital in Bhubaneswar, India, kills at least 20 people.

byline.contributor: Taniya Mallick contributed reporting from Bhubaneswar, India.

lead_paragraph: The victims at Sum Hospital in Bhubaneswar, in the state of Odisha, appear to have died of smoke inhalation.

headline.main: Hospital Fire in Bhubaneswar, India, Kills at Least 20
headline.print_headline: Fire at a Hospital in India Kills at Least 20
